header.name: Ignacio Arzaut
header.title: Software Developer
header.description:
I specialize in delivering high-quality IT solutions using a wide array of technologies.
Continuously learning and growing as a developer.
Committed to mastering my craft and solving complex problems with efficient solutions.

about.title: About me
about.description:
I am currently employed in a dynamic and challenging environment, where I am responsible for the development of a back-end Node.js micro-service architecture, which provides multiple APIs (REST and RPC) for clients to consume, and integrating with several third party services.

I also havo previous professional experience working in the front-end with React.js, Next.js, Redux Toolkit and more.

In addition to my software development experience, I also possess knowledge in DevOps tools such as Docker, Docker-Compose, Gitlab CI/CD, DigitalOcean, Nginx, Linux, and Bash

I have the ability to work across the entire stack and deliver results in a timely manner, and I continuously seek opportunities to grow as a developer

items.title: Universidad Nacional de Río Cuarto
items.description: Cursé primer año y regularicé las materias Lógica, Introducción a la Algorítmica e Introducción al Álgebra. (3/4). De todas maneras decidí dejar porque la dirección que tomaba no era lo que esperaba

items.title: Instituto Tecnológico de Río Cuarto
items.header: Tecnicatura Superior en Desarrollo de Software
items.description: Me gustó mucho más la experiencia académica de esta institución, llevo la carrera en buenas condiciones y también formo parte del equipo del iTec Lab (Iniciativa de la institución para introducir a los alumnos al mundo profesional).

description.text:
This is the most complex and challenging project and the one where I've learned the most.

I'm working as the lead back-end developer for an e-commerce platform, where my main responsibilities are designing and building a node.js micro-service architecture which provides APIs (REST and RPC) for clients to consume and integrates with several third party services.

achievements: Designed, built and maintained back-end micro-service architecture
Designed and implemented databases for each micro-service (MongoDB and PostgreSQL)
Designed and implemented multiple REST and RPC APIs
Integrated with many different third party services
Dockerized backend infrastructure with Docker-Compose and automated deploy with Bash scripts
Built custom npm module for a company requirements
Implemented RPC direct-reply pattern to communicate microservices between each other
Implemented notifications service (push, email, sms, whatsapp, discord)
Implemented monitoring service (Grafana Loki)
Backend infrastructure deployment in cloud platforms such as DigitalOcean
Set up web server and reverse proxy with Nginx
Wrote integrations tests

description.text:
I was responsible of designing, developing and deploying two frontend apps and a backend API for a client.

The first app is a registration form for employees, and the second one is an admin panel where they could perform different operations upon the registrations.

The backend API is responsible of managing the employees data, authentication, and the business logics.

achievements: Designed and implemented front-end and back-end from scratch
Successfully merged this project with an existing infrastructure and business logics
Consumed and rendered data from a REST API
Manually deployed all three applications to a server instance
Implemented a search engine
Implemented token based authentication and authorization
Integrated with different third party services
Achieved client expectations in a timely manner

description.text:
This project was a platform was an ongoing project that offered online courses for drum players.

As my first project, my only responsibilities were completing frontend tasks that were given to me.

These included handling permissions, creating a live chat, integrating a video player, rendering pdf files, and more.

achievements: Consumed and rendered data from a REST API
Implemented a live chat
Implemented a streaming video player
Implemented a pdf viewer
Implemented pdf zoom feature
Integrated with different third party services
Achieved client expectations in a timely manner

description.text:
iTec Labs is a software factory owned by the same institute where I studied. They provided the opportunity to a selected number of students to have our first job experiences.

 I worked in several projects that involved learning and implementing those learned skills in a dynamic and challenging environment. This is where I learned my first professional experiences, and everything that comes with it.

achievements: Implemented the fundamentals of React
Implemented the fundamentals of API REST with Express.js
Designed and implemented relational and no relationals databases
Implemented state management with Redux
Implemented token based authentication and authorization with JWT
Integrated with different third party services
Worked as I learned in a fast paced environment
Deployed frontend and back applications
Set up reverse proxy and web server with Nginx

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.text: If you like what you see, you want to work with me, or just want to say hi, feel free to write me. My inbox is always open for new opportunities.
